name: pay to win (malek elsady)
description:
a game where you have to move away ads and pull out your credit card constantly to continue moving along and not slow down to the ads slowing the frame rate

better played with mouse

controls: ad or left and right to move / w, space or up to jump / LMB to close ads / number keys to type in card digits / backspace to undo a number / down to change gravity

made by malek elsady for the gdko round 10 (btw idk if what i did counts as fitting the theme )
